name: Legacy of Suffering
storyline:
The date is November 15th, 2145. On a remote moon base, the Union Aerospace Corporation - UAC, performs its secret military experiments when the most destructive force in the universe is unleashed. It doesn't take too long for it to reach for the small Moon base. 
 
John Logan, one of 4 super soldiers existent, finds himself forced to figth a battle which his blood already waited for. Armed to the teeth, John sets out in search for answers and an epic confrontation with hellspawn forces.
summary: Legacy of Suffering (a.k.a LOS), is a Doom 3 themed mod for GZDoom and Skulltag created by Logan MTM, released on 28 November 2009, and was updated on December 1 the same year. It received one of the 2009 Cacowards. The mod also contains artworks by Licinio Ribeiro de Souza and was playtested by Nigel "Enjay" Rowand.
